nodes.text: Nightshadow anti-sensor treatment was made by Arakyd Industries and was designed to be placed on the hull of a spaceship to avoid detection. The sensor-baffling coating would allow the ship to avoid detection, but could be nullified if the ship traveled too fast, as the engine emissions would negate the sensor baffling. As an anti-sensor coating, Nightshadow could also be used to line smuggling compartments against scans.
